description: Index of 2^n within sequence of numbers of form 2^i*7^j.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) ~ kn^2 + O(n) with k = log(7)/log(2) - log(7)^2/log(2)^2. [_Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 28 2011]
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: An incorrect g.f. was deleted by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 16 2009
